problem.markdown:
Which factor below is the most important when choosing an algorithm? ( ) Simplicity ( ) Ease to implement ( ) Runtime ( ) Space complexity (memory) ( ) Solution Accuracy (x) Each one of the above could be the most important, depending on the situation
[explanation] Any one of these could be the determining factor! Simplest -- when the code might be used as a tutorial. Easiest to implement -- when speed of authoring is most critical. Takes less time -- when runtime performance is most important (e.g., the code has to perform well in real-time, or will be called millions of times as a helper function). Uses up less space -- when space is limited, say on mobile or embedded devices. Gives a more precise answer -- when correctness is critical, say in astrophysics, or when auto-piloting an autonomous vehicle. [explanation]
problem.p: Which factor below is the most important when choosing an algorithm?
